column2: "prediction": "The Ukrainian Ministry of Health has announced plans to implement stricter control over the sale of the painkiller tramadol
column3: which is believed to have narcotic properties. This comes amidst concerns about the growing number of young people using drugs
column4: particularly in the eastern regions of Ukraine. According to Minister of Health Nikolai Polischuk
column5: almost 80% of drug users are under the age of 30
